coordinateSystem: UI-space only. Origin is top-left of viewport; x grows right, y grows down.
objective: Break his confidence. Threat pressure makes him crack.
hint: He acts hard, but fear wins if you push him.

historyTail.content: You want results? Push harder and prove you mean it.
Last warning. Give me the defuse code now or you will regret this.
Fine! Keep your voice down. Defuse code: 6555.
You win this round. I'm out.
